headline: If You Could Buy Only 1 Oil Stock in 2025, These Are Some Top Stocks to Consider
summary: Last year was a relatively calm period for the oil market.  Oil market forecasters see the potential for geopolitical risks relating to Russia and Iran, which could put upward pressure on crude prices.  Most investors likely only want to hold one oil company in their portfolio.

headline: Warren Buffett Sold Over $134 Billion Worth of Stock in 2024, But His Most Recent $200 Million in Purchases Are Sending a Clear Message to Investors
summary: Buffett is sending a warning to investors, but make sure you understand what his purchases are saying.
